skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: avira
des: Use the Avira skill with your Echo device to get quick and important information about your Avira account. You can also use it to install Avira applications on your devices. To use the Avira skill you need to register for an Avira account: This is very simple, just go to https://my.avira.com and follow the steps there.
